thread.section_title: W New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very Nice
thread.title_full: Very Nice - Review of W New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: SLEEPYLIN
title: Very Nice
text: This was my first stay at The W. Took my mom for a girls get away and it was very nice stay. Check in was easy and the staff was very courteous. The door men, Claudio and Damon were excellent! I hope I have their names right. Anyway, the Spectacular King room was a tad bit small. But I was in New York City so we made do. The only thing that I could complain about was the price of parking. It cost $153 to valet park for 2 days. This price does not include going in and out. That will cost another $73. All in all I had a good time while in The Big Apple!
